content: Formulate a list of 20 words that begin with 'dis'.

1. Disappear
2. Disconnect
3. Discover
4. Discuss
5. Disease
6. Dishonest
7. Disapprove
8. Disappear
9. Disarray
10. Disbelief
11. Discourage
12. Disgrace
13. Dishearten
14. Dishonor

16. Disaster

18. Disloyal
19. Disobey
20. Dispose
